summary: The diff implements the majority of the requested requirements (REQ-13 through REQ-17). REQ-17 backend changes are present (gameUrl field, migration, addGame), REQ-14 category filter bar is implemented, REQ-15 leaderboard with refresh button and score submission form is implemented, REQ-16 UI polish (hover effects, featured games, top player ticker, page transitions, loading progress bar) is implemented. However, several specific acceptance criteria have gaps: the backend seeding of at least 2 games per sport category is not evidenced in the diff, and the migration only sets gameUrl to empty string rather than a meaningful default placeholder URL.

missing_requirements.requirement: Pre-populate the backend with at least 2 real sports game entries per category (Cricket, Football, Basketball, Tennis) with valid, real game URLs pointing to popular free online sports games.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the backend model updated with gameUrl and migration logic, but no seeding or initialization code populating at least 2 games per sport category with real URLs is visible in the truncated backend/main.mo or any other file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Existing games without a URL are given a default placeholder URL rather than breaking.
missing_requirements.reason: The migration sets gameUrl to an empty string for existing games rather than a meaningful default placeholder URL as described in the acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin page with admin-specific hooks (useIsCallerAdmin, useGetAllUsers, useUpdateUserProfile, useDeleteUser, useResetUserData) and admin navigation link in Navbar
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any admin page, admin hooks, or admin navigation link. These appear to be additional features not requested in REQ-13 through REQ-17.

hallucinated_features.description: AccessDeniedScreen component with animated ping effect
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement in the build request mentions an access denied screen component.
